entry.title: ZDI-22-870: SAP 3D Visual Enterprise Viewer CGM File Parsing Out-Of-Bounds Write Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
entry.summary: This vulnerability allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code on affected installations of SAP 3D Visual Enterprise Viewer. User interaction is required to exploit this vulnerability in that the target must visit a malicious page or open a malicious file.
